body.name: wirarpa Women's Cotton Underwear High Waisted Ladies Panties Full Coverage Briefs 4 Pack (Regular & Plus Size)

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Pastel Yellow/Shell Pink/ Quartz Pink/ Lilac - Set 18
Soothing Sea/Orange/ Slate Rose/ Lilac- Set 21

features: Care instructions Hand Wash or Machine wash in cold with like colors. Non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. We recommend hang drying for better and longer performance.

STRETCHY COVERED WAISTBAND: Wirarpa women's underwear with soft stretchy DOUBLE-LAYER fabric covered waistband sits right at the waist. No rolling or bunching, with no compression but perfectly snuggish. The high rise underwear offers moderate tummy support and reduces the appearance of muffin top.

SOFT EASY ON EASY OFF PANTY: Comfy full coverage panties, suitable for postpartum c-section and abdominal surgery recovery. Perfect for women's cotton panties because they're SUPER high rise with tiny bit of pressure on the tummy during that time which offers a nice soothing feeling.

DOUBLE-LAYER CROTCH: NO RIDING UP PANTIES with double-layer crotch offer added protection. Chafe-free leg openings and high-waist full-coverage design avoid embarrassing adjustment all day time. Suitable for home, bedtime and everyday use.

STAY IN PLACE UNDERPANTS: The women's Cotton briefs with stretchy enough to make you feel secure. Easy on and easy off panty, not too tight or loose but just comfortable. Nice alternative to "granny panty" type briefs. Wash well with less shrink.
We always expect your inquiry and support. Please let us know if there's any question. Your suggestion will help us to improve products and provide more great products.
body.description: wirarpa Women's High Waisted Cotton Briefs Underwear 95% Combed Cotton, 5% Spandex Soft Cotton stretch briefs, it make your feel more confident as they smooth out signs of muffin top in a dress, are soft, extremely comfortable and they hide post baby loose skin.Soft stretchy double-layer covered waistband(About 2cm elastic inside.) sits right at the waist.Most comfortable women's panties, Easy to get into and out of but no sagging or bunching. Soft and comfortable to wear, breathable and wick moisture away from the skin. Fit is beyond comfortable. Supportive but not constraining. Soft & Breathable, heath and Skin-Friendly No ride up underpants; Easy on and Easy off Superior elasticity,Slight support in the belly area. Suitable for postpartum c-section recovery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and supportive
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these undies! They do shrink slightly but not enough for it to matter. I like the fit, the support and durability. They don’t roll down at all and stay in place all day. They are super stretchy and feel like a thicker cotton blend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about these underwear! They're super comfortable, you feel like you're going commando! They fit extremely well, great coverage, just enough support (wish they had just a bit more), non-binding, smooth under clothing, size chart is correct, the fabric is super soft, and they launder well! What's not to love? Buy with confidence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable, great quality
reviews.reviewText: I hesitate to purchase underwear online because I like to touch it and see how it feels but this one hit it out of the ballpark. They are soft cotton with a bit of stretch. Super comfortable, nice thick quality and weight. Perfect for plus size. My new favorite underwear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Being that I am a modest lady, I'm not going to take a pic of myself in my undies, but believe me when I say these are great fitting panties. They are comfy, soft, gently form fitting and make all the difference when Aunt Flo is visiting.For years I've been fighting with trying to keep my sanitary napkin in place and dealing with horrible accidents. Come to find out the crazy moving around was because my panties weren't form fitting enough. I got these around that time of the month and ( after washing, of course.) I just put them on, not thinking about it. I noticed that the sanitary napkin was much more snug against my body, didn't wiggle around and that I didn't have the usual endless embarrassing accidents.I felt more confidence to get around and do things. I also noticed that the seat is wide enough to cover the under area. I don't know why other companies are making undies so narrow that they cover hardly anything, feel like they are sawing you in half and you hardly have room to stick a napkin. It makes it so hard when dealing with Aunt FLo. The crazy thing is that they think we ladies are too stupid to notice what they've done. It's one thing to have mail in the mailbox behind, but a whole different thing when you've get it in the front! These panties are wide enough to accommodate the whole with of a sanitary napkin, even those with wings. I've also noticed that napkins stick better and are easier to remove w/out leaving sticky residue or pieces. I do want to say that these do hold you in slightly, offering support of the stomach. This can help those who have back pain or stomach issues and make clothes fit a bit better. The only draw back is that the seat of the panties are a bit thick and not as breathable as I like So if you're hot natured or going through the change you might find yourself sweating down there and the material doesn't seem to dry fast. However it seems to wick the moisture away from your skin a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They're huge but comfortable
reviews.reviewText: My husband took one look at these coming out of the dryer and exclaimed "They're huge!" Yes, but they do have a lot of stretch and are fairly comfortable; except for the line that runs around your waist that is "dropped" from the garment waist. You do feel that, and I don't know why there are so many manufacturers doing that! And the line does show under some pairs of shorts. But they are quite soft and overall are ok. I am losing weight so I won't have them long anyway. The sizing is a bit large. Will buy ones without the drop waist in future.

reviews.reviewerName: Any one of us on the account
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good undies - but here’s the good, the bad and the ugly
reviews.reviewText: So, here’s my take:-Very comfortable.-Keep their size - don’t stretch out or shrink.-Wash really well. I feel like nothing sticks to them so they truly wash out.-Because they stay snug they smooth you out.-Speaking of stick. NOTHING sticks to them. Your pad will be sideways and crooked. So if you are a pad wearer - keep your favorite period underwear.The fabric makes you sweat a bit more because it isn’t as breathable. Long drives not recommended no one wants to smell like unwashed butt.Overall I would definitely buy again - I replaced all of my old stuff but kept a few just in case. So I’m super happy with my decision.Sorry no pics of my undies in action.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Underwear Ever
reviews.reviewText: This is my second order, just so I don't have to wear one of my other pairs between washes. They're high-waisted enough for us oldies who don't like to wear clothes on our hips. The reinforced waist prevents sliding down and spillover. They're extremely comfortable and the colors are really pretty. And they wash well, my older ones still look and feel brand new. I'll never buy another brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best underwear ever
reviews.reviewText: The quality is excellent..sizing is exact... comfort is amazing! Being a big woman such as myself, I worried about the fit, but I am so relieved and happy with this purchase. I'm glad I ordered two packages and will surely order more as needed.😊
These are great underwear. They don’t ride up and are nice and high in the waist to keep the tummy tucked in and smooth. They look great under pants. I have already ordered more of them.

These underwear fit perfectly! They are so comfortable, keep their shape after washing many many times, and I love that there are no seems in the crotch that are bothersome. I've bought these in three different colors.
Bune material, la talla es demasiado ajustable yo pediria dos tallas menos la proxima vez pero ahora la necesitaba asi.100% algodon.Cintura super alta.
This is my third purchase of Wirarpa cotton underwear. These panties are very soft and comfortable, very well-made. I especially like the fantastic colours. I highly recommend them.
